mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teamb_free_board_comments (free_Comments_Num, free_Board_Num, meeting_Num, contents, userid, write_Date) VALUES (seq_reply.nextval, #{free_Board_Num}, #{meeting_Num}, #{contents}, #{userid}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT free_Comments_Num, free_Board_Num, meeting_Num, contents, userid, write_Date FROM teamb_free_board_comments WHERE free_Board_Num = #{free_Board_Num} ORDER BY free_Comments_Num asc

SELECT free_Comments_Num, free_Board_Num, meeting_Num, contents, userid, write_Date FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX(teamb_free_board_comments idx_reply) */ rownum rn, free_Comments_Num, free_Board_Num, meeting_Num, contents, userid, write_Date FROM teamb_free_board_comments WHERE free_Board_Num = #{free_Board_Num} AND free_Comments_Num > 0 AND rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount}
SELECT count(free_Comments_Num) FROM teamb_free_board_comments WHERE free_Board_Num = #{free_Board_Num}
